name: CreateNewVendor
description:
Creates a new vendor in the Freshservice system.

Use this tool to create a new vendor in Freshservice. Call this tool when you need to add a vendor to your vendor list, providing necessary details to complete the registration.

parameters.name: vendor_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique integer ID of the vendor to be created in Freshservice.

parameters.name: vendor_name
parameters.description: The name of the vendor to be created. It should be a string.

parameters.name: vendor_description
parameters.description: Detailed description of the vendor, including any specific information or notes relevant to the vendor.

parameters.name: primary_contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the primary contact for the vendor. This contact is a requester whose details (name, email, phone, mobile) are referenced from the requester database.

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the primary contact (Primary contact is a requester. The primary contact name, email phone and mobile number will be referenced from the requester details)

parameters.name: address_line_1
parameters.description: The first line of the vendor's address, such as street name and number.

parameters.name: address_line_2
parameters.description: The second line of the vendor's address, typically used for apartment or suite numbers.

parameters.name: vendor_city
parameters.description: The city where the vendor is located.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state or province where the vendor is located. Use a string value to specify the state.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country where the vendor is located. Provide the full name of the country.

parameters.name: location_zip_code
parameters.description: Zip Code of the vendor's location.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the vendor

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the vendor

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the vendor

parameters.name: primary_contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the primary contact (Primary contact is a requester. The primary contact name, email phone and mobile number will be referenced from the requester details)

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the primary contact (Primary contact is a requester. The primary contact name, email phone and mobile number will be referenced from the requester details)

parameters.name: address_line1
parameters.description: Address Line 1

parameters.name: address_line2
parameters.description: Address Line 2

parameters.name: address_city
parameters.description: City
